sentences.sContent: Negotiators are due to meet later today to work out a compromise.
sentences.sCn: 谈判者们预定在今天晚些时候会面以找到一个折中的办法。

sentences.sContent: It took me some time to work out what was causing this.
sentences.sCn: 它花了我一些时间，找到导致这种状况的原因。

sentences.sContent: Things just didn't work out as planned.
sentences.sCn: 事情没有像计划的那样进展顺利。

synos.tran: 解决；算出；实现；制定出；消耗完；弄懂

trans.tranOther: If you work out a solution to a problem or mystery, you manage to find the solution by thinking or talking about it
